com.inamik.template
Class TemplateContext

java.lang.Object
  com.inamik.template.TemplateContext

public final class TemplateContext
extends java.lang.Object

TemplateContext - The container for the runtime-state of a template.

The context manages variables and macros and provides other functions, such as those for including other templates.

Created on or before July 11, 2006

Author:
Dave

WARNING: As of this writing, this method has not been tested.

Parameters:

Returns:

                  throws TemplateException

processMacro

public TemplateBodyContent processMacro(TemplateMacro macro,
                                        boolean capture)
                                 throws TemplateException
processMacro - Process a macro within this context.

This method can optionally capture the output generated by the processed macro and return it to the caller.

Parameters:
macro - The macro to process
capture - Whether or not to capture the macro output.
Throws:
TemplateException
java.lang.NullPointerException - If macro == null
See Also:
addMacro(String, TemplateMacro), getMacro(String), macroExists(String), removeMacro(String), addMacros(Map), clearMacros(), TemplateMacro

includeTemplateFromFile

public void includeTemplateFromFile(java.lang.String filename)
                             throws TemplateException,
                                    java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                    java.io.IOException
includeTemplateFromFile - Load a template from a file and process it within the current context.

This is a convenience method and is equivelent to:

   includeTemplateFromFile, filename, false)

Parameters:
filename - The filename of the template to load
Throws:
TemplateException
java.io.FileNotFoundException
java.io.IOException
java.lang.NullPointerException - If filename == null
See Also:
includeTemplateFromFile(String, boolean)

includeTemplateFromFile

public TemplateBodyContent includeTemplateFromFile(java.lang.String filename,
                                                   boolean capture)
                                            throws TemplateException,
                                                   java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                   java.io.IOException
includeTemplateFromFile - Load a template from a file and process it within the current context.

This method can optionally capture the output generated by the included template and return it to the caller.

Parameters:
filename - The filename of the template to load
capture - Whether or not to capture the template output.
Returns:
If capture == true, returns any generated output from the included template, otherwise returns null
Throws:
TemplateException
java.io.FileNotFoundException
java.io.IOException
java.lang.NullPointerException - If filename == null
See Also:
TemplateEngine.loadTemplateFromFile(String)

                                 throws TemplateException,
                                        java.io.FileNotFoundException,

                                     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException

Parameters:
filename - The name of the file to search for, relative to the template root

java.io.FileNotFoundException
